organization.description:
CCDH is an advocacy organization that provides, arranges and coordinates services to adults with developmental disabilities, and to children with developmental, physical, and sensory disabilities. 

Miami-DadeGu00c7u00d6s lead agency advocating, planning, providing, coordinating and arranging for services benefitting people with developmental and other disabilitiesGu00c7u00aa

THE ADVOCACY NETWORK ON DISABILITIES champions the rights of individuals with intellectual, developmental, and other disabilities by promoting inclusion, providing services, and advancing systems change. Miami-DadeGu00c7u00d6s lead agency advocating, planning, providing, coordinating and arranging for services benefitting people with developmental and other disabilitiesGu00c7u00aa

Services include:

* Individual Advocacy and Case Management
* Stipends for In-Home Supports
* Legislative & Public Policy Advocacy
* Training and Technical Assistance to increase the capacity of community programs to include children with disabilities
* Funding for Wheelchair Repairs for children
* Professional Development and Training
organization.name: THE ADVOCACY NETWORK ON DISABILITIES, INC.
